description:
As noted in this spec:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/393205/6/specs/ocata/approved/add-whitelist-for-server-list-filter-sort-parameters.rst

We should have an index on the instances.updated_at table because that's what's used to filter instances when using the --changes-since filter parameter with nova list.
title: instances.updated_at should be indexed for 'nova list --changes-since' queries
